title: Upcoming Kassadin Nerfs too Hard?
body: Maybe your not like me and dont check PBE updates but Kassadin the god is getting a huge nerf with his ult range being reduced from 700 to 450. Does anyone else think this is too big of a nerf? I feel like he will drop down to being one of the worst mages on the game because of this! thoughts?

replies.body: 700 down to 450? What the fuk!!! this can't be true!
sadly it is check the latest pbe updates :(

I just checked it..... its so heart breaking ='[ But there were some buffs to the ult like reduced mana cost but the range is such a major nerf is going to make wall jumping freaking hard especially jumping through the nexus to juke your enemies.
They should of nerfed down to at least 550 that way he can still escape the enemies range or just leave it at 450 but let him have some ms that decays over 2 seconds.

i think if they really wanted to nerf reduced the distance to 600 and increase mana cost by a small amount
and then if he is still overpowered in there eyes reduce it further, the current nerf seems too hard too me
When is this nerf taking place?
Wednesday/ Thursday i expect new patch to come out!
Good it was deserved. Next they will nerf katarina.

I would honestly like a riot explanation for such a heavy nerf before they make it official. I mean kassadin is supposed to be a late game hyper carry, but with 450 range ult I don't see how he can possibly be relevant at any stage of the game anymore. I usually don't complain when riot tries to balance the game out but I believe this is over the top.

With 450 range he wouldn't even be able to close the gap on an ADC.... I can't help but feel this nerf is completely directed at professional play, which is unfair to the rest of the League of Legends community. I can only hope they don't go through with it....
Oh sweet so now dumb bricks can't play like derpy kids and fly off your screen the second they sense danger!
I agree the nerf is going to hurt him, but the truth his he needs a nerf. I believe it will be a lil to harsh but at the same time maybe not. We will just have to see.
I dont think his burst is that powerful! He needs to get good trades to kill now but with this nerf he may as well be a support! I thought he was quite balanced right now if not a little bit op!
Oh well. Seems like he will fall out of the hide and seek tier.
